How To Use

Using the Savings Calculator

Follow these simple steps to get your results

1

Enter Current Bill

Input your current monthly phone bill amount or select your carrier for average pricing.

2

Select Lines

Choose how many phone lines you're comparing - individual or family plans.

3

View Your Savings

See your monthly and annual savings compared to Vouch's $30/month unlimited plan.

4

Make the Switch

Ready to save? Start your switch to Vouch and keep your number.

Why This Matters

Why Most People Overpay for Phone Service

The average American pays $141/month for cell phone service - that's over $1,692 per year. Much of this cost goes to fancy stores, celebrity endorsements, and device financing. Vouch cuts the extras and passes the savings to you while using the same AT&T network.

  • Average US phone bill: $141/month vs. Vouch's $30/month
  • Family of 4 can save over $1,000/year
  • No hidden fees or surprise charges
  • Same AT&T network coverage as premium carriers

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about the Savings Calculator

Our calculator uses industry-average pricing data and your actual input. Your real savings may vary based on taxes, fees, and specific plan features from your current carrier.

Vouch's $30/month price is the base plan cost. Taxes and regulatory fees vary by location and are added at checkout, but our total is still significantly less than major carriers.

Vouch's Premium plan includes unlimited talk, text, and data, plus 5G access, 5GB mobile hotspot, eSIM support, WiFi calling, and no credit check or contract.

Yes! Families can save even more. While we price each line at $30/month, your total savings multiply with each line you switch from an expensive carrier.
